name: Goal Blitz
description:
SCORE like a true football star in this FREE game! Keep shooting goals and catch that fire.
How many goals can you make in a row?

It's time to show the world your skills in this non stop action shooter football game. Navigate through different obstacles and make your way to the top like a true soccer pro!

Features-
* Addictive gameplay
* Non stop action
* Fun obstacles
* Different locations to navigate through
* Unlock cool balls and try out amazing costumes!!
